result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephen Titus Boone was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Stephen Titus Boone is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Stephen Titus Boone was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Stephen Titus Boone was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counts 1 and 3 dismissed.  No contest plea to counts 2 and 4, Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders 60 days Rock Co Jail on each count, concurrent--TIME SERVED; Court orders 22 days Rock Co Jail in lieu of costs, consecutive to sentence--TIME SERVED; 82 days sentence credit.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 7, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 22, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Scott H. Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on May 5, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Jack C. Hoag.  Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by court, jury trial to be set.

Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Valerie A. Zisman.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen Titus Boone in court in custody with attorney Ashley Jade Morse.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 13, 2015, at 3:00 pm.
No contact directly or indirectly with victim C.K.R., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere.
